column3: Cut Peppers on top and empty Mix rice with Oil and onions and fill peppers. Place in large saucepan Boil for 1/2 hour
Fry the onions and add tomatoes.Stir for 5 mins Then add the Green Beans salt Carrots and Water.
Piercepotatoes and cook in microwave for 10 mins Halve the potatoes season with olive oil bake in a pan for 10 mins scatter over salsa cheese beans and cook for 15 mins in oven pour avocado lemon mix
Chop the Onions and peel the courgettes Add tomato paste fry for 1-2 mins add courgettes red pepers and carots cook till soft and serve
